name: genuineness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being honest and sincere: There was a genuineness about her. I may disagree with some of the views they express, but I have never doubted their genuineness.
the quality of being real and exactly what it appears to be: We cannot guarantee the nature, quality, condition, genuineness or value of these items. The company were required to prove the genuineness of the documents. See
genuine
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a genuineness to the people that is not fake.Even through the TV screen people could feel her genuineness, how true she was. We will verify various documents, determining their genuineness and authenticity.
